artist: Painter: Paul Bril; Engraver: Willem Adriensz van Nieulandt
description: landscape with city at right; road foreground with one mounted figure and one on foot at left facing city; two figures on foot at right leaving city; river with small boat center ground
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

in plate in black: [Paulus Bril jnue/Nieulant fecit/   a bon enfant excu/ avec privingeg du Roy]; on sheet in pencil: [1-184]
title: Print
